name: Min Order Amount For WooCommerce
author: Rajdip Sinha Roy

sections.description:
Set a WooCommerce minimum order amount and change the notice texts for the cart & checkout page.
If minimum order value is not satisfied in checkout page then users can’t checkout or place order.
This plugin will give you an advantage option for WooCommerce minimum order amount, as well as options to separately change the notice texts for the cart and checkout pages.

Suggestions

The plugin does not change any core files or database.

If you’re facing any issues:-
Deactivate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.

Translators

Available Languages

  • English

If you can’t find this plugin in your language and want to translate it, use the dedicated tool at [Translating WordPress] (https://translate.wordpress.org/locale/it/default/wp-plugins/min-order-amount “Translating WordPress”).

Or, if you have created your own language pack, or have an update for an existing one, you can send it as an email attachment at rajdipsinharoy@yahoo.in.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. GOTO to WooCommerce -> Settings and scroll down to the Minimum order settings to configure the options.
sections.faq:
Does this work for WordPress < 5.0 ?

If you are using a version before 5.0, It’ll work but recommended to use latest WordPress and WooCommerce.

Does this work only in the WooCommerce ?

Yes, this only works with WooCommerce.
